decision_conditions: The development to which this permission relates shall be begun not later than the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

Reason: To comply with Section 91 of the Town & Country Planning Act 1990. | The development hereby approved shall be carried out in accordance with drawing title(s): Proposed Ground Floor Plan drawing no. TRICON131IMR/201 Issue B, Proposed Elevation drawing no.TRICON131IMR/203 Issue A, Roof Plan drawing TRICON131IMR/204 Issue A  and Proposed Site Plan TRICON131IMR/203 Issue B
Reason: For the avoidance of doubt and in the interest of proper planning
| All external materials to be used in the development shall match that of the existing dwelling and as per approved drawings.

Reason: To ensure that the materials harmonise with the surroundings, in accordance with policies 1.1 & 1.2 of the Ealing Core Strategy (2012), policies 7.4 & 7B of the Ealing Development Management Development Plan Document (2013), policies D3 and D4 of the London Plan (2021) and the National Planning Policy Framework (2023) - Section 12

| Cycle storage for two (2) bicycle spaces shall be provided within the curtilage of the site, within a secure, lockable compound in accordance with all adopted standards prior to occupation of the building and be continuously available and retained for the life of the development hereby approved.

Reason: To provide adequate cycle parking storage to align with National Planning Policy Framework 2023 - section 9, policy T5 of the London Plan (2021), Ealing's Sustainable Transport SPG and Ealing's Climate and Ecological Emergency Strategy 2021- 2030
description: Single storey side/rear wraparound extension and conversion of a garage into a habitable space (replacing existing garage door with a window)
